name: Racing Champs
description:
Race with other players around the world in an exciting, intuitive racing game! Easy to learn controls make driving fun and easy to pick up and play. Slide to drift, tap to boost, and you will be driving like a champ in no time!

FEATURES:
- Simple, intuitive controls
- Various exciting driving locales
- Awesome cars to race in
- Real multiplayer with people around the world
